constructor.details: Constructor. Must send the amount at stake when creating the contract. Note that the move and salt must be saved.

params._c1Hash: Must be equal to keccak256(c1,salt) where c1 is the move of the j1.

j1Timeout().details: Let j2 get the funds back if j1 did not play.

j2Timeout().details: Let j1 take back the funds if j2 never play.

play(uint8).details: To be called by j2 and provided stake.

solve(uint8,uint256).details: To be called by j1. Reveal the move and send the ETH to the winning party or split them.

params._salt: The salt used when submitting the commitment when the constructor was called.
